mapper.select: SELECT content_id, title, addr1, zipcode, first_image, first_image2, readcount, sido_code, gugun_code, latitude, longitude FROM attraction_info a WHERE a.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') or a.addr1 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')

SELECT content_id, title, addr1, zipcode, first_image, first_image2, readcount, sido_code, gugun_code, latitude, longitude FROM attraction_info a WHERE a.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') or a.addr1 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') ORDER BY readcount ${order}
SELECT content_id, title, addr1, zipcode, first_image, first_image2, readcount, sido_code, gugun_code, latitude, longitude FROM attraction_info a ORDER BY readcount ${order}

SELECT a.content_id, a.title, a.addr1, a.zipcode, a.first_image, a.first_image2, a.readcount, a.sido_code, a.gugun_code, a.latitude, a.longitude, AVG(r.score) AS average_score -- 평균 점수 계산 FROM attraction_info a LEFT JOIN review r ON a.content_id = r.content_id GROUP BY a.content_id, a.title, a.addr1, a.zipcode, a.first_image, a.first_image2, a.readcount, a.sido_code, a.gugun_code, a.latitude, a.longitude

SELECT a.content_id, a.title, a.addr1, a.zipcode, a.first_image, a.first_image2, a.readcount, a.sido_code, a.gugun_code, a.latitude, a.longitude, AVG(r.score) AS average_score -- 평균 점수 계산 FROM attraction_info a LEFT JOIN review r ON a.content_id = r.content_id GROUP BY a.content_id, a.title, a.addr1, a.zipcode, a.first_image, a.first_image2, a.readcount, a.sido_code, a.gugun_code, a.latitude, a.longitude HAVING a.content_id = #{contentId};

SELECT a.content_id, a.title, a.addr1, a.zipcode, a.first_image, a.first_image2, a.readcount, a.sido_code, a.gugun_code, a.latitude, a.longitude, AVG(r.score) AS average_score -- 평균 점수 계산 FROM attraction_info a LEFT JOIN review r ON a.content_id = r.content_id GROUP BY a.content_id, a.title, a.addr1, a.zipcode, a.first_image, a.first_image2, a.readcount, a.sido_code, a.gugun_code, a.latitude, a.longitude ORDER BY average_score desc LIMIT 10000
